Name: Underworld Mayhem

INTRODUCTION:

This document describes a game called Underworld Mayhem, which is designed to be a 2D Top-Down  Action Survival Game.

TECHNOLOGY: Underworld Mayhem will be developed for the Windows Platform using the McKilla's Gorilla game engine, which is a bare-bones engine developed by Richard McKenna for rapid prototyping 2D games. DirectX will be used as the underlying rendering technology. 

FL studio will be used for the audio:

Various tools such a Tiled,paint and photoshop will be used to create the tileset and the artwork

BACK STORY: 

You’re a retired veteran. You found out that your dearest comrade-in-arms has committed a misunderstood sin and ends up in hell. Knowing this, you end up trying to break through the barriers of hell to find [insert person] and drag him out.As you kill more demon spawns from hell, the barrier into hell weakens, allowing you to progress through hell and getting you closer to your [insert your goal]

OBJECTIVE

Your task is to enter the 9 circles of hells and fight your way to your comrade. On your journey there, you will encounter demon spawns that will hinder your progress. You will have to kill them and collect power ups.

GAMEPLAY

You start with a small view of your area, every enemy that you slay has provides experience points and upon leveling up you will be able to choose a powerup and your view of the world will expand. Once you level up enough and exit to the next level will become available. 

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse click to shoot
  • Projectiles are shot in the direction of the mouse cursor

GRAPHICAL USER INTERFACE ARTWORK

All artwork in the game will be original. The following needs to be created:

  • Character - our character will be dressed in soldier gear
  • Character with Weapon
  • Walking Left
  • Walking Right
  • Walking Up
  • Walking Down
  • Taking Damage
  • Dying
  • Shooting
  • Collecting Buff
  • Demon - red demons with horns
  • Running Towards Player
  • Dying
  • Taking Damage
  • Attacking
  • Potentially a Boss Monster if time permits.
  • Floor and Wall Tiles - The map will consist of collidable barriers and floors that present the hell atmosphere
  • Buffs - buffs that can be collected
  • Attack Speed
  • Attack Damage
  • Speed
  • Health Buff

SOUND EFFECTS

All sound effects will be original. Sounds must be made to coincide with each of the following events:

  • Player Attack
  • Player Taking Damage
  • Player Death
  • Demon Attack
  • Demon Taking Damage
  • Demon Death
  • Picking up Buffs
  • Level Up
  • Finished Level

MUSIC:

TBD, but the music theme can be related to something heavy metal type to represent your bloodbath through hell
